backend/main.mo: Actor that includes the blob storage mixin for basic storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Valentine‑related features, their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for major frontend files and components used in the Valentine experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode variants, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a default Valentine‑themed title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, personalization, the Valentine card flow, celebration animations, and CTA visibility.
frontend/src/components/AdminToolLinkCop: Admin‑only UI button that copies a special tool access link when an admin token is present in the URL hash.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates 30 rising heart animations that auto‑clear after completion.
frontend/src/components/Fireworks.tsx: Placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Creates 20 continuously floating hearts with varied opacity, timing, and size.
frontend/src/components/MakeYourOwnCTA.t: Fixed-position CTA button that navigates users to the wishlink tool page.
frontend/src/components/SmilingEmojiAnim: Displays bouncing smiling emojis when triggered, clearing them after the animation ends.
frontend/src/components/UpwardSmileAnima: Renders upward‑rising smiling emojis with random timing and positions when the celebration effect is triggered.
frontend/src/components/ValentineCard.ts: Interactive Valentine card component with moving 'No' button, yes-response animation, and personalized recipient handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and animations for hearts, glow, scale, and other UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/WishlinkToolPage.tsx: Page for generating personalized Valentine share links with copy-to-clipboard features and a themed UI.
frontend/src/utils/personalization.ts: Utility functions for normalizing recipient names, parsing them from URLs, and generating shareable personalized links.
frontend/src/utils/routing.ts: Utilities for detecting tool routes in URL variations and navigating between the tool page and the main Valentine experience.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, known issues, features, and build/deployment context for the Valentine SPA.
